title:
Mean Hausdorff Dimension of Some Infinite Dimensional Fractals for
  Amenable Group Actions
abstract:
This paper is devoted to the calculation of the mean Hausdorff dimension of
some infinite dimensional fractal systems for the countable discrete amenable
group actions. We mainly consider the self-similar systems, homogeneous systems
in the infinite-dimensional torus and infinite-dimensional carpets, which
generalizes [23] from actions of a single transformation to amenable group
actions.
